Hello! My name is Juan and I am FullStack Web Developer . I'm a proud nerd / computer-geek ü§ì and I love everything related to technology. I like to teach and share my knowledge. That is why I teach code classes in EANT and participate in developer communities such as @ FrontEndCaf√© and @FreeCodeCamp .

Besides being a constant learner, I am an entrepreneur. I am the founder and creator of the startup abogaciapractica.com . In it, I took the role of designer, developer, layout designer, sysAdmin, content creator, QA, customer service and other tasks of a startup.

I consider Teamwork flexibility to mold the project and its development to the specific circumstances of the environment using agile methodologies to achieve it.
